modName: making your obj models useable in Skyrim
summary: Video tutorial for using Nifscope, Nifconvert, and Chunkmerge to make your .obj models usable in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Video tutorial for using Nifscope, Nifconvert, and Chunkmerge to make your .obj models usable in Skyrim.  I have never made a video tutorial before, so point and make fun of me...I don\'t care, my mom says I\'m cool!

There is an awesome PDF tutorial that covers a lot of this information at
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21065

you can download Nifscope and the Nif import/export plugin for 3ds Max and Blender at:
http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/Projects

and you can download Nifconvert and Chunkmerge in one .zip at:
http://www.2shared.com/file/ibjIfvnr/NifUtilits_Eng.html
author: hyperactivechild
